name: Blueair

”Alexa, ask Air Purifier to start cleaning”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: air purifier
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can use the Blueair skill to ask Alexa to change your air purifiers settings.
 
The Blueair skill supports Blueair’s connected products DustMagnet & HealthProtect/Protect & Blue.
To get started with Blueair's skill for Amazon Alexa, follow these steps:
 
1. Download the Blueair app from your relevant app store. Register an account, login and follow the app instructions to pair your product.
 
2. Ensure your Alexa device is paired and online. Open the Alexa app. Select the ‘Skills’ menu and search for ‘Blueair’.
 
3. Open the Blueair skill and select the option to "Enable Skill". Authenticate using your Blueair app login credentials (Email address and password).
 
4. After the skill has been successfully enabled, you can start communicating with your Blueair devices using your voice. Below is an example list of Blueair’s custom Alexa skills.
 
• Alexa, turn on my air purifier
• Alexa, increase air purifier's fan speed
• Alexa, set fan speed to 1 on air purifier
• Alexa, set fan speed to 2 on air purifier
• Alexa, set fan speed to 3 on air purifier
• Alexa, turn on auto mode on air purifier 
• Alexa, turn on night mode on air purifier

The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number
